tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_engagement_events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR,
    event_date DATE,
    social_media_platform VARCHAR,
    engagement_metrics JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE Social_Media_Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR,
    followers_count INT,
    following_count INT,
    profile_bio TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_engagement_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    total_likes INT,
    total_shares INT
)

CREATE TABLE event_attendees (
    attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(255),
    attendee_email VARCHAR(255),
    attendence_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    post_text TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    total_views INT,
    likes INT,
    shares INT
)

CREATE TABLE event (event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 event_name TEXT,
 event_date DATE,
 event_location TEXT);

CREATE TABLE social_media_post (post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 event_id UUID REFERENCES event(event_id),
 post_content TEXT,
 post_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE user_engagement (engagement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 post_id UUID REFERENCES social_media_post(post_id),
 user_id UUID,
 engagement_type TEXT);

CREATE TABLE event_analytics (analytics_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 event_id UUID REFERENCES event(event_id),
 total_engagement INT,
 average_engagement FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
   post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   account_id INT NOT NULL,
   post_text TEXT,
   post_date TIMESTAMP,
   engagement_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE event_engagement (
   event_id INT NOT NULL,
   post_id INT NOT NULL,
   engagement_level VARCHAR(20),
   FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES social_media_posts(post_id)
);
